sentences.sContent: He attributed this to a dilution effect of the herbicide.
sentences.sContent_eng: He attributed this to a dilution effect of the herbicide.
sentences.sCn: 他把这归因于除草剂的稀释效应。

sentences.sContent: Weed identification technology is the key to the realization of selectively spraying herbicide for the environmental protection.
sentences.sContent_eng: Weed identification technology is the key to the realization of selectively spraying herbicide for the environmental protection.
sentences.sCn: 田间杂草识别技术是实现变量喷洒除草剂以保护环境的关键所在。

sentences.sContent: Weed identification technology is the key to the realization of selectively spraying herbicide for the environmental protection.
sentences.sContent_eng: Weed identification technology is the key to the realization of selectively spraying herbicide for the environmental protection.
sentences.sCn: 畎亩杂草辨认技术是实现变量喷射除草剂以掩护环境的要害地点。

remMethod.val: herb(草) + i + cide(杀) → 除草剂

trans.tranOther: a substance used to kill unwanted plants
